description:
The captains of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads find themselves gradually overpowered by the Reigai forces. Meanwhile, Rukia, Uryu, Renji and Chad use their teamwork to fight Kageroza.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Reigai VS Genshu, Hokori o Kaketa Gekitou!
Reigai Vs. Original, The Fierce Fighting for Gambled Pride!
Reigai contre l`original, le combat féroce de la fierté
霊骸vs原種, 誇りを賭けた激闘!
